headline: TPG in advanced talks to buy Crown Castle's fiber unit for $8 billion, source says
summary: Buyout firm TPG is in advanced talks to buy the fiber unit of tower operator Crown Castle for about $8 billion, a person familiar with the matter said.  Shares of the Houston, Texas-based Crown Castle were up 2.1% in trading after the bell.  TPG, along with fiber network owner Zayo Group, was vying for Crown Castle's fiber and wireless assets, Reuters had reported in October, citing people familiar with the matter.

headline: State Of REITs: Recession To Recovery In 2025
summary: REITs surged 20% before the Fed's rate cuts but now face challenges. See why valuations, not fundamentals, are behind their 45% underperformance gap.
